mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(memId, memPassword, memName, memNickname, memEmail, memPhone, memSex, memBirthday) values(#{memId}, #{memPassword}, #{memName}, #{memNickname}, #{memEmail}, #{memPhone}, #{memSex}, #{memBirthday})
mapper.select: select memId, memName, memNickname, memPassword, memEmail, memPhone, memSex, memBirthday, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, regiDate, verify from tbl_member where memId = #{memId}
